item.title: Newest signature
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

[quote=“Pookey71, post:7, topic:287998”][quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=380785.msg2864722#msg2864722 date=1247383280]

Lodl, fucking lodl. The point is I wanted it to look novice.
http://s116.photobucket.com/albums/o38/pookey71/ <- As I said, I’m looking for a contrast of colours. I like things that are abit odd. You know, I don’t like the grain.

The fuck is lodl? And I don’t care for it…

Firstly, why respond if you don’t care? Isnt that abit redundant?! Why call a signautre novice if you don’t know the reason behind it? You must really suck.

I gave you cnc, which is what you need. I’ve seen your work, I don’t think you’re any better than me. You need to focus on depth and lighting, the colors in this tag don’t blend, and they’re way too overcontrasted. “You must really suck.”

I told you in the other post WHY I didn’t like it.
[/quote]
As I said, I wanted this certain signature to look novice. It’s meant to look easy, also looking at your work I can say I am. Or atleast you’re on par with me. Nothing is meant to blend, I didn’t want it to blend. That’s the point.[/quote]
Alright, I understand. I’ve got some new sigs but people on here would say it’s shit so… >.<

Read full topic
